alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:08PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 445 PM EDT... At 408 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pinecrest, or over Kendall, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Gables, South Miami, Kendall, The Redland, Pinecrest, Sweetwater, Westchester, Glenvar Heights, Richmond West, Fountainbleau, Richmond Heights, Country Walk, Kendale Lakes, Palmetto Bay, Zoo Miami, The Hammocks, West Perrine, Olympia Heights, West Kendall and Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
